response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I estimate its worth to be $15,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $12,000. This price reflects my commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can benefit you further.", "product_price": 12000}
